title: Samsung USB Drivers for Mobile Devices v1.5.45 Installer
description:
SAMSUNG UNIVERSAL USB DRIVERS FOR MOBILE DEVICES v1.5.45



The USB drivers allows a Samsung mobile phone, note or tablet running Android to connect to Windows via USB. Install these drivers if you plan to transfer files to your PC via USB, or for Android development purposes.

Note: You can get these drivers via Samsung Kies if you have it installed on your Windows PC.


---------------------------
Prerequisite requirements:
---------------------------
1. Microsoft Windows 32-bit or 64-bit PC with 40MB free of disk space.
2. Uninstall previous version of the same driver.


------------------------------
Steps to install the drivers:
------------------------------


1. Run "Samsung.Mobile.Devices.USB.Drivers.1.5.45.exe" as an Administrator on your Windows PC.

2. Follow instructions on screen to install the drivers.


Enjoy.
